/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves forming a canopy over the road. On either side of the street, buildings rise up, their facades bathed in sunlight. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, adding a touch of modern life to the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly green and brown, reflecting the natural and urban elements of the landscape.
